Plot: A wild teenage girl orchestrates a romance between her nanny and her father, who is a recovering addict.
Title: Hateship Loveship
Writer: Mark Poirier (screenplay), Alice Munro (short story "Hateship,  Friendship,  Courtship,  Loveship,  Marriage")
Actors: Kristen Wiig, Guy Pearce, Hailee Steinfeld, Jennifer Jason Leigh
tomatoConsensus: Kristen Wiig's vibrant performance is almost worth the price of admission -- and it has to be, because Hateship Loveship doesn't have much else going for it.
